name: Moon Dreams
description: Moon Dreams is an old-style gamebook, made in Twine, set around an astral plane called Moon Dreams which few people can access. You play the role of an illusionist called Suvad Tor, recent graduate of the Camirand Magic Academy. Your quest is to find an extremely powerful magical artefact in order to destroy it at your wedding, in accordance with wizard traditions. To get there, you'll have to face many different and bizarre places within the Moon Dreams, including one of your memories, a hollow world, and a golden city built by slaves. Many paths, and the possibility of taking an item with you when you "die," make this gamebook very replayable.
